How to Use
  1. 1Select your content type (Post, Comment, Headline, or About)
  2. 2Type or paste your text in the input area
  3. 3Watch the character count update in real-time
  4. 4Use the preview to see how it will look on LinkedIn
  5. 5Copy the text when you're ready to post
Pro Tips
  • ‚Ä¢LinkedIn posts with 1,300-1,500 characters get the most engagement
  • ‚Ä¢Headlines should be under 120 characters for optimal display
  • ‚Ä¢Comments under 200 characters tend to get more replies
  • ‚Ä¢Use the preview to check how your content will appear on mobile
